Author: Kevin Holman
Description: This MP example will backup the unsealed MP's in your SCOM 2012 and 2016 environments. It is based on the very popular SCOM 2012 MP from http://www.systemcentercentral.com/pack-catalog/backup-unsealed-management-packs-opsmgr-2012-edition This MP contains a rule, that ruins once a day, and targets the All Management Servers Resource Pool.  It will backup your MPs to a specific directory or share.  It contains a powershell script write action, and a timer datasource.
